actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to designate certain lands in the Theodore Roosevelt National Memorial Park, N. Dak., as wilderness.

summary.text: Designates specified lands in the Theodore Roosevelt National Memorial Park in North Dakota as wilderness, to be administered by the Secretary of the Interior.

titles.title: A bill to designate certain lands in the Theodore Roosevelt National Memorial Park, N. Dak., as wilderness.
